inStorePickupLabel.inStorePickupInstruction2Label: Bring your vaild government issued ID to the store
inStorePickupLabel.whoIsPickingupLabel: WHO IS  PICKING UP THIS ORDER?
inStorePickupLabel.inStorePickupInstruction1Label: Before going to the store,wait for an email confirming it's ready
inStorePickupLabel.inStorePickupInstruction3Label: Bring this confirmation email or your order number with you
inStorePickupLabel.pickOrderInstructionLabel: What you need to know for picking up your Item
inStorePickupLabel.pickOrderInstructionMessage: Please note a 10% restocking fee will be charged if your Item is not picked up...
inStorePickupLabel.sofDisclaimerNote:
• You must be at least 18 years of age topurchase a rifle or shotgun
  • If you are a resident of Florida, you must be at least 21 years of age to purchase a firearm.
  • You mustbe at least 21 years of age and a resident of the state where the transfer will occur to purchase a handgun or pistol-grip firearm.
inStorePickupLabel.sofDisclaimerFull:
I understand that by ordering a firearm I am the only person who can complete the firearm paperwork in store. 

 

Firearms purchased online are shipped to your local Academy Sports + Outdoors as selected in the checkout process. All firearm purchases require valid U.S. government issued ID and related firearm paperwork. You must pass a criminalbackground check for all firearm purchases. Age and residency restrictions apply. You must meet all other requirements as set forth by applicable Federal, state and local statutes, rules and regulations for firearm purchase. Other terms and condition

cms.checkoutUnauthDescriptionText: You are checking out as a guest.Sign in for a faster checkout experience
cms.cvvHintText: The 3 digit code found on far right of signature box
cms.promotionalSignupText: Sign up to get Hot Deals. Weekly Ads, Local Events and more delivered straight to your inbox. You can unsubscribe at anytime.
cms.reviewOrderSubText: By selecting this checkbox I agree that I understand I must be 18 or older to purchase Rifle or shotgun Ammunition and 21 or older to purchase Handgun Ammunition.By ordering this product I certify that I am of legal age and satisfy my jurisdiction's legal requirements to purchase this product.
cms.saveShippingInfoLabel: Save Shipping Info to My Account
cms.reviewOrderDescriptionText: By placing this order, I accept Academy's Terms and Conditions and Privacy Policy
cms.addressVerificationUnableDescription: We were unable to verify your address with the postal database. Using the address you entered may cause delays receiving your order.

shipmentTypes.subTitle: If ordered by 2 PM CST.Ground shipping

shipmentTypes.title: Basic Delivery
shipmentTypes.subTitle: We will deliver to your door with no appointment or signature required.Note:If you're shipping to an appartment or multi-unit building , please select another option.

shipmentTypes.title: Scheduled Delivery
shipmentTypes.subTitle: We will call and schedule to deliver inside your main entrance.

shipmentTypes.title: Room of Choice
shipmentTypes.subTitle: We will call and schedule delivery to your room of choice.

cms.sendSmsLabel: Send SMS text updates  about my order.This phone number will not be used for promotional purpose.

cms.pinHintTextLabel: The pin is located above the barcode
cms.giftCardAddedLabel: Gift Card {{giftcardnumber}} added.{{amount}} has been applied.
cms.giftCardTextLabel: Please keep your physical gift card for future reference to assit with any returns or oder cancellations.
cms.paypalPaymentTextLabel: Paypal account for accept@academy.com. Amount to be charged:
cms.applePayTextLabel:
Clicking on ApplePay Button will show you the payment sheet hosted by the Apple where you will choose your credit card.

Please make sure that your order details are correct and you have entered any promotion codes before click on Applepay Button.

Once you press Buy with ApplePay,your order will be placed and your card will be authorized.
cms.checkoutWithVisaSubText:
Its fast use your visa.com user ID and password to fly through checkout with just few clicks.
Its easy-Visa Checkout will autofill your payment information for you!.Just confirm and be on your way.
